headline: Evergy's Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Decrease Y/Y
summary: EVRG beats Q2 EPS estimates despite weather and cost pressures, though revenues slip year over year.

headline: Evergy Inc (EVRG) Q2 Earnings Surpass Estimates
summary: Evergy (EVRG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +7.89% and -1.93%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Evergy: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo. AP) — Evergy, Inc. EVRG) on Thursday reported second-quarter profit of $171.3 million.

headline: Evergy Announces Second Quarter 2025 Results, Declares Quarterly Dividend and Reaffirms 2025 Guidance
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo., August 07, 2025--Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) today announced second quarter 2025 GAAP earnings of $171.3 million, or $0.74 per share, compared to GAAP earnings of $207.0 million, or $0.90 per share, for the second quarter 2024.
